languages.text: "Но из этого же огня ты черпаешь свою силу. Прими его без остатка. Прими себя — и усмири бушующее пламя".
"But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."
languages.original_text: "Но из этого же огня ты черпаешь свою силу. Прими его без остатка. Прими себя — и усмири бушующее пламя".

traits.locale_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."
"But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."
"But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."
"But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."
"But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

languages.text: “但是，烈火也会带来力量。全心全意地接受这股力量，接受你自己——驯服狂热的火焰。”
languages.original_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

traits.locale_text: “但是，烈火也会带来力量。全心全意地接受这股力量，接受你自己——驯服狂热的火焰。”

languages.text: «Pero ese mismo fuego le otorga poder. Acéptelo plenamente. Acéptese a usted mismo, y someta el fuego a su control».
languages.original_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ese mismo fuego le otorga poder. Acéptelo plenamente. Acéptese a usted mismo, y someta el fuego a su control».

languages.text: « Mais cette flamme vous octroie la puissance. Acceptez-la. Acceptez-vous et maîtrisez ce brasier. »
languages.original_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

traits.locale_text: « Mais cette flamme vous octroie la puissance. Acceptez-la. Acceptez-vous et maîtrisez ce brasier. »

languages.text: "Aber dieses Feuer gibt Euch Kraft. Nehmt es vollumfänglich an. Nehmt Euch selbst an – und zähmt das lodernde Feuer."
languages.original_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

traits.locale_text: "Aber dieses Feuer gibt Euch Kraft. Nehmt es vollumfänglich an. Nehmt Euch selbst an – und zähmt das lodernde Feuer."

languages.text: 「しかし、この炎はお前に力を与える。それを完全に受け入れるのだ。何より、自分自身を受け入れろ。そして荒れ狂う炎を手なずけるのだ」
languages.original_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、この炎はお前に力を与える。それを完全に受け入れるのだ。何より、自分自身を受け入れろ。そして荒れ狂う炎を手なずけるのだ」

languages.text: "Fakat bu yangın sana güç veriyor. Onu kabullen. Kendini kabullen ve amansız yangını kontrol altına al."
languages.original_text: "But this fire provides you with power. Accept it fully. Accept yourself — and tame the raging fire."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat bu yangın sana güç veriyor. Onu kabullen. Kendini kabullen ve amansız yangını kontrol altına al."
